mapper.select: SELECT "INDEX", PROD_NO, "SIZE", STACK, TOP, BOTTOM, COLOR_NO, COLOR_NAME, RGB FROM PROD_DETAIL LEFT JOIN PALETTE USING (COLOR_NO) WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo} AND STACK > 0
SELECT IMG_NO, REF_NO, COLOR_NO, IMG_TYPE, IMG_NAME, COLOR_NAME, RGB FROM IMAGE LEFT JOIN PALETTE USING (COLOR_NO) WHERE REF_NO = #{refNo}

#{item}
